name: Animalove
description:
The things we do for love. You are a fragile animal on the brink of death, wishing to see your lover one more time. Overcome extreme difficulty, with each level introducing a new twist. Do not expect to make it to the end. You will not succeed.

A/D - move

W - jump

ENTER - restart (you will need this a lot)

7 - skip levels (if you really have to)
